title: Shin Onimusha: Twilight of Desire
original_name: 新鬼武者 TWILIGHT OF DESIRE
sinopse: Based on the popular Capcom videogame series Onimusha, Twilight of Desire fills in more of backstory of this rich world and its characters. In this all-new chapter, Samanosuke clashes blades with Toyotomi Hidetsugu, nephew of the villainous Toyotomi Hideyoshi. Plus, learn more about how Hideyoshi came to utilize the dangerous Genma Power.
